00029 /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00032 char *void_sprintf(char *datastr, char *format, void *data);
00033 void void_sscanf(char *str, char *format, void *data);

00039 /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------
00040     FUNCTION: do_action()
00041      PURPOSE: Perform action if a item is selected by a hotkey or
00042               by <ENTER>
00043  DESCRIPTION: -
00044      RETURNS: nothing
00045      HISTORY: 28-Aug-1992 10:00:00 V0.1 - Initial version
00046               02-Jan-1993 16:13:09 V0.2 - New flag: EDIT_STR.
00047                                           Deleted NO_EDIT flag.
00048 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 void do_action(MENU *menu, int i)
00050 {
00051   char datastr[80], *s;
00052 
00053   /*---------------------------------------
00054     Toggle a BOOLEAN value
00055   ---------------------------------------*/
00056   if (menu[i].flags & SELECTABLE) {
00057     if (menu[i].data == FALSE)
00058       menu[i].data = (void *) TRUE;
00059     else
00060       menu[i].data = (void *) FALSE;
00061     return;
00062   }
00063 
00064   /*---------------------------------------
00065     Edit a string
00066   ---------------------------------------*/
00067   if (menu[i].data != NULL
00068   && (menu[i].format != NULL)
00069   && (menu[i].flags & EDIT_STR)) {
00070     s = void_sprintf(datastr,menu[i].format,menu[i].data);
00071     if (s) {
00072       editstr(action_row+2,action_col+2,30,menu[i].header,datastr,_DRAW);
00073       void_sscanf(datastr,menu[i].format,menu[i].data);
00074       return;
00075     }
00076   }
00077 
00078   /*---------------------------------------
00079     Enter help functions if HELP_ONLY
00080   ---------------------------------------*/
00081   if (menu[i].flags & HELP_ONLY)
00082   {
00083     help(menu[i].help);
00084     return;
00085   }
00086 
00087   /*---------------------------------------------
00088     If a function was defined, perform function
00089   -----------------------------------------------*/
00090   if (menu[i].function != NULL)
00091   {
00092     (*(PFI)(menu[i].function))();
00093     return;
00094   }
00095 
00096 }
00097 
00098 /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------
00099    FUNCTION: popup()
00100     PURPOSE: Make and react on a popup menu
00101  DESRIPTION: This function creates an popup menu with text and
00102              values of referenced data. The upperleft corner of
00103              the popup menu is (row,col)
00104     RETURNS: Hot-key of selected item if available, else
00105              the number (0...number-1) of the item selected,
00106              If ESC is pressed, ESC is returned.
00107     VERSION: 910828 V0.6
00108              12-Oct-1993 V0.7 - wn_open() now uses size of external window
00109                                 (incl. borders) -> adapted size of
00110                                 popupwindow.
00111 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------*/
00112 unsigned int popup(int  number,     /* Number of menu items                   */
00113           MENU *menu,      /* Pointer to an array of MENU structures */
00114           int row,         /* Upper row for the menu                 */
00115           int col )        /* Left column for the menu               */
00116 {
00117   int i,mlen;
00118   unsigned int key = ARROW_DOWN;    /* Default key */
00119   WINDOW *popup_window;
00120   char datastr[132], *s;
00121   static int select = 0, old_select = 0;
00122   static MENU *oldmenu = NULL;
00123   static int autorow = FALSE;
00124   static int last_row = 0;
00125   static int autocol = FALSE;
00126   static int last_col = 0;
00127 
00128   wn_log("START POPUP()\n");
00129   wn_log_indent(+2);
00130 
00131   /*---------------------------------------
00132     Determine row
00133   ---------------------------------------*/
00134   if (row == AUTO_ROW) {
00135     if (!autorow) {
00136       row = action_row;
00137       last_row = action_row;
00138       autorow = TRUE;
00139     }
00140     else {
00141       row = last_row;
00142     }
00143   }
00144   else {
00145     autorow = FALSE;
00146     last_row = row;
00147   }
00148 
00149   /*---------------------------------------
00150     Determine column
00151   ---------------------------------------*/
00152   if (col == AUTO_COL) {
00153     if (!autocol) {
00154       col = action_col;
00155       last_col = action_col;
00156       autocol = TRUE;
00157     }
00158     else {
00159       col = last_col;
00160     }
00161   }
00162   else {
00163     autocol = FALSE;
00164     last_col = col;
00165   }
00166 
00167 
00168   /*---------------------------------------
00169     Fill menu strings with data
00170   ---------------------------------------*/
00171   for (i=0 ; i<number ; i++)
00172   {
00173     menu[i].string[0] = '\0';
00174     strcpy(menu[i].string,menu[i].header);  /* Copy 'header' to 'string' */
00175     s = void_sprintf(datastr,menu[i].format,menu[i].data);
00176     if (s)
00177     {
00178       strcat(menu[i].string,"  ");      /* Add blanks  */
00179       strcat(menu[i].string,datastr);   /* Add 'datastr' to 'string' */
00180     }
00181   }
00182 
00183   /*-----------------------------------
00184     Determine the maximum line length
00185   ------------------------------------*/
00186   mlen = 0;
00187   for (i=0 ; i<number ; i++)
00188     mlen = max(mlen,strlen(menu[i].string));
00189 
00190   /*------------------------------------------------------------
00191     Open the window and print the items
00192     12-Oct-1993 V0.7: Add 2 for xsize to include window borders
00193   -------------------------------------------------------------*/
00194   popup_window = wn_open(_SINGLE_LINE, row, col, mlen+2, number+2,
00195                     _menu_att, _border_att);
00196   row = popup_window->y1;
00197   col = popup_window->x1;
00198 
00199   wn_log("printing popup menu items:\n");
00200   for (i=0 ; i<number ; i++)
00201   {
00202     if (menu[i].flags & COMMENT)
00203       hotstring(row+i,col,-1,menu[i].string,_comment_att);
00204     else if (menu[i].flags & DISABLED)
00205       hotstring(row+i,col,-1,menu[i].string,_disabled_att);
00206     else
00207       hotstring(row+i,col,menu[i].hotkey,menu[i].string,_menu_att);
00208   }
00209 
00210   /*-------------------------------------------------------
00211     If it is the same menu as last time, we use the last
00212     selected item to highlight
00213   -------------------------------------------------------*/
00214   if (menu == oldmenu)
00215   {
00216     select = ++select % number;
00217     old_select = select;
00218   }
00219   else
00220   {
00221     select = 0;
00222     old_select = 0;
00223     oldmenu = menu;
00224   }
00225 
00226   while(TRUE)
00227   {
00228     /*-------------------------------------------------------------------
00229       Reset attribute of old selected line.
00230       Don't do this when the item is a COMMENT or when it is DISABLED
00231     --------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00232     if (!(menu[old_select].flags & (COMMENT|DISABLED))) {
00233       v_setattrib_area(row+old_select,col,mlen,1,_menu_att);
00234       hotstring(row+old_select,col,
00235         menu[old_select].hotkey,menu[old_select].string,_menu_att);
00236     }
00237 
00238     /*-------------------------------------------------------------------
00239       Set attribute of new selected line.
00240       Don't do this when the item is a COMMENT or when it is DISABLED
00241     --------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00242     if (!(menu[select].flags & (COMMENT|DISABLED))) {
00243       action_row = row+select;
00244       action_col = col;
00245       v_setattrib_area(action_row,action_col,mlen,1,_menu_highlight);
00246     }
00247 
00248     if (!(menu[select].flags & (COMMENT|DISABLED)))
00249       key = waitkey();            /*--- Scancode is returned here  */
00250 
00251     if (is_fkey(key)) {
00252       switch(key) {
00253         case F1:  help(menu[select].help); break;
00254         default:  do_funkey(key); break;
00255       }
00256     }
00257 
00258     /*-----------------------------------------------
00259       If hotkey defined, make this the new key value
00260     ------------------------------------------------*/
00261     switch(key) {
00262       case ENTER:
00263         if (menu[select].hotkey != -1)
00264           key = menu[select].header[menu[select].hotkey];
00265         break;
00266       default:
00267         break;
00268     }
00269 
00270     switch(key) {
00271       /*----------------------
00272       | Up- and down arrow
00273       -----------------------*/
00274       case ARROW_UP:
00275             wn_log("ARROW_UP\n");
00276         old_select = select;
00277         select = (--select+number) % number;
00278         break;
00279 
00280       case ARROW_DOWN:
00281             wn_log("ARROW_DOWN\n");
00282         old_select = select;
00283         select = ++select % number;
00284         break;
00285 
00286       /*--------------------------------------
00287       | No hotkey defined for this popup menu
00288       ----------------------------------------*/
00289       case ENTER:
00290             wn_log("ENTER\n");
00291         if (menu[select].flags & EXIT) {
00292           wn_log_indent(-2);
00293           wn_log("END POPUP()\n");
00294           popup_window = wn_close(popup_window);   /* Close it before actions */
00295         }
00296         do_action(menu,select);
00297         wn_log_indent(-2);
00298         wn_log("END POPUP()\n");
00299         popup_window = wn_close(popup_window);
00300         return(select);           /* Return number of selected item [0,...> */
00301 
00302       /*----------------------
00303       | Escape from popup()
00304       ----------------------*/
00305       case ESC_KEY:
00306       case ARROW_LEFT:
00307       case ARROW_RIGHT:
00308             wn_log("ESC or ARROW_LEFT or ARROW_RIGHT\n");
00309         wn_log_indent(-2);
00310         wn_log("END POPUP()\n");
00311         popup_window = wn_close(popup_window);
00312         return(key);
00313 
00314       default:
00315             wn_log("OTHER KEY\n");
00316                 key = key & 0x00FF;     
00317         if (key > 31 && key < 128) {
00318           for (i=0 ; i<number ; i++) {
00319             if (toupper(key) == toupper(menu[i].header[menu[i].hotkey])) {
00320               if (menu[i].flags & EXIT) {
00321                 wn_log_indent(-2);
00322                 wn_log("END POPUP()\n");
00323                 popup_window = wn_close(popup_window);
00324               }
00325               do_action(menu,i);
00326               wn_log_indent(-2);
00327               wn_log("END POPUP()\n");
00328               popup_window = wn_close(popup_window);
00329               return(toupper(key));
00330             }
00331           }
00332         } /* if (key ...) */
00333     } /* switch(key) */
00334   } /* while (TRUE) */
00335 
00336   if (key == ENTER)
00337     return(select);
00338   else if (key == ESC_KEY)
00339     return(ESC);
00340   else
00341     return(toupper(key));
00342 }
